stages.description: Stories test with single stage plan

acts.title:
Given I go to Handow_Form 
(http://www.handow.org/lab/demoform)

facts.title:
Then I can see Form_View 
(#demo-form-container)
is displayed
facts._title: I can see it {selector} is displayed

facts.title:
And I can see Submit_Button 
(#form-submit)
is disabled
facts._title: I can see it {selector} is disabled

acts.title:
When I enter Username_Value 
(Ja)
to Username_Input 
(#form-input-username)

facts.title:
Then I can see Validate_Error 
(#username-validation)
is displayed
facts._title: I can see it {selector} is displayed

whens.scenario: Fill form with valid Username and Email when no-secured(phase-3)

acts.title:
When I enter Username_Value 
(Mark Davis)
to Username_Input 
(#form-input-username)

And I enter Email_Value 
(mark.davis@gmail.com)
to Email_Input 
(#form-input-email)

facts.title:
Then I can see Submit_Button 
(#form-submit)
is enabled
facts._title: I can see it {selector} is enabled

whens.scenario: Select level no matter secured or no-secured(phase-4)

acts.title:
When I select Level_Option1 
(1)
of Level_Select 
(#form-select-level)

facts.title:
Then I can see Submit_Button 
(#form-submit)
is enabled
facts._title: I can see it {selector} is enabled

acts.title:
When I click Submit_Button 
(#form-submit)

And I wait Spin 
(#ajax-loading-spin)
is disappeared

facts.title:
Then I can see Feedback_Message 
(#form-feedback)
is showing Success_No_Secured 
(Submit successfully)
facts._title: I can see it {selector} is showing text {text}
